data.title: What is an .SDC format, and how to open it?
data.meta_description: Details of .SDC file extension. üëâ List of software that supports opening .SDC file format on: üñ•Ô∏è Windows, üíª Mac OS, ‚å®Ô∏è Linux, üì± Android.
data.text:
Secure Download Cabinet

‚áí Category:Compressed Files‚áí Developer:Microsoft Corporation

üìå Generally, the .SDC container is recognized as an encrypted and compressed archive applied for the custom installation of MSDNAA (Microsoft Developer Network Academic Alliance) project bundle. At most, this respective software package is shared through ELMS (the E-academy License Management System), a flexible service for the distribution of program utilities to academic and educational institutions. When the noted bundle is downloaded from the genuine software initiative portal, Secure Download Cabinet resource entries should be opened with the UnpackSDC suite in the automatic way. This workflow would lead to further extraction and installation of entry contents and proper deletion of the SDC sample when the routine is accomplished.

Stardock Central Download Archive

‚áí Category:Backup Files‚áí Developer:Stardock

üìå In other circumstances, an outcome .SDC container may refer to the archived bunch of file resources downloaded with the assistance of Stardock Central, an advanced download manager for Stardock utilities and distributions. In common, the .SDC entry includes installers that have been formerly downloaded from the web-area. Stardock-relied .SDC resources are typically initiated and generated as backup samples and are normally stored within the Program Files\Stardock\Stardock Central\BACKUP folder by default. Afterwards the .SDC data objects can be accurately applied to reinstall desired program updates or for transferring former bundle installations to another infrastructure or workstation. Currently the development of the Stardock Central initiative is completely discontinued.

Apache OpenOffice Calc Spreadsheet

‚áí Category:Spreadsheet Files‚áí Developer:Apache Software Foundation

üìå Besides, the .SDC extension branch may correspond to the spreadsheet generated by the Calc software toolkit included into StarOffice and Apache OpenOffice repositories. In this specific occasion, the .SDC items are composed of embedded flexible options for cell formatting, such as flawlessly rotating templates, borders, backgrounds, and contents. In conclusion, the .SDC file entities can be easily exported into the .PDF or .XLS representation from within the integrated Calc utility. The noted .SDC constitution may embrace predefined mathematical calculations, formulas, charts, equations, diagrams, and other categories of statistical and digital content, including graphics and text. The following .SDC data type is mostly oriented on cross-platform open-source office distributions, widely exploited by the web-community.

Paragon Dictionary Database File

‚áí Category:Database Files‚áí Developer:Paragon Software

üìå One more definition of the .SDC file container relies on the database structure employed by the dictionary services and toolkits designed and distributed by Paragon Software, in the ordinary circumstances Advanced Learner‚Äôs Oxford Dictionary applet. In practice, this corresponding .SDC item includes specific dictionary-referenced content, such as word pronunciation audio, relevant definitions, and words. In the most accustomed cases, the .SDC file samples are pretty large, more than 400 MB in size ratio. When being used on an Android device, the .SDC instances are commonly stored on the SD card. For instance, the .SDC object for the aforementioned Oxford Dictionary applet can be effortlessly found in the /sdcard/Android/data/com.slovoed.oald.files/ directory, stored within the SD card of your smartphone or tablet.

How to open an .SDC file?

üìå The ordinary .SDC file category can be reviewed, opened and modified by the Calc spreadsheet editor embedded into Apache OpenOffice, LibreOffice, or Planamesa NeoOffice distributions. The following .SDC extension branch correlates with various spreadsheet data, arranged into grids of individual columns and cells. In other peculiar preconditions, the .SDC object may be suitable for storing composite Advanced Learner‚Äôs Oxford Dictionary resource data, compatible with any contemporary revisions and editions of Android environment. One more opportune case of .SDC extension utilization is the packaged archive encoded and bundled into MSDNAA distributive, effortlessly shared across official Microsoft channels. The following subbranch of .SDC file content is suggested to open automatically when UnpackSDC module is properly downloaded from the ELMS system.
